content.title: Buttock Lift Thailand - Bangkok and Samui
h2: WOULD YOU LIKE TO GET SURGEON FEEDBACK?
paragraphs: There’s no need for you to feel bad about your sagging buttocks when there’s an affordable buttocks lift in Thailand  that will solve the problem for you . With this procedure you can have the butt that you had in your younger days and get back the confidence that you had as well. So if you want to improve the saggy buttocks seriously consider a butt lift.

Buttocks lift Thailand, should not be mixed up with buttock implants or body contouring. This procedures has the goal to improve the tone and tautness of the skin on your buttocks. This surgery is meant to address the issue of skin that’s sagging in the buttock area that is a result of weight loss, genetics, gravity or age. The butt lift will tighten the skin that’s drooping and reposition the buttock in such a manner that the tone and contour is improved. Basically, what this procedure does is provides a more normal shape and contour to your bottom.

When performing the procedure, first the surgeon makes an incision from hipbone to hipbone on your back. From the structures that are underlying the skin and the fat is separated. The excess skin as well as the fat are removed. There’s a temporary tube that’s inserted to allow drainage of excess fluid from the surgical area before the incision is stitched up. When the incision is closed, gauze and elastic compression are applied to the area.

The procedure can take anywhere from three to six areas, but it depends on the extent of the treatment you’re having done. Once the lift is completed you’ll be required to stay in the hospital for two nights. You must be aware that this surgery, as with any other, have risk involved. During the post-operative buttocks lift Thailandyou should not sit on the buttocks since they’re healing from the surgery. While, you’re recovering, you may suffer from a fair amount of pain when there’s any stress applied to the area.

The chances are rare, but complications can include, hematoma, numbness of the skin, bruising, drainage of fluid, scarring and discomfort. Pulmonary embolism can also occur, but is rear. If you want to have this surgery done you have to be a candidate. You’re a candidate if you have skin of the hip that has lost its elasticity or if you have saggy skin in the thigh or buttock area.

When you undergo buttocks lift Thailandyou’ll be able to see that your thigh and buttock skin are tighter and more attractive, and have an improved contour and decreases irregularities on the surface of the skin. So you know that when you come to Thailand for this surgery that you’ll go home with a buttocks that you won’t be able to help but show off.
The great thing about buttocks lift Thailand, not only will you be able to improve the way your buttocks looks, but you’re also get the chance to relax in a beautiful country.

Fill out the Medical Questionnaire (next page) to help our plastic surgeon determine if you are medically qualified for your surgery. Surgeon will carefully review your case and prepare an initial evaluation, including a price quote for procedure(s).
Tell us what you are looking for and we will send you all the information…

( click to enlarge ) Nights in Hospital: 2-3 Duration of operation is about 3-6 hours and you need to stay in Thailand for atleast 9 days.
